trans-unit.source: this event is visible for the following usergroups / Access Rights
allDay
Available Seats: Set this to a value higher than 0 if you want registrations using Waiting list. Can be combined with Avaiable Seats
Enter the citrixUid of your goTo Webinar event. (means You FIRST have to create the event in the citrix portal!)
description
endDate
endTime
eventCategory
eventType
Upload files, visible to all who may see the event. Depending on your layout if in List view or/and Detail view
Upload files, visible to had registered to the event. Depending on your layout if in List view or/and Detail view. or maybe only in a registration email notification
Upload files, visible AFTER the event. Depending on your layout and definied workflow or maybe only in an notification email after the event to the attendees
Fe. If Weekly, select if every thursday or only every second week.
select Kind of Frequency: Daily, weekly, monthly, yearly
Upload more Images. It is Depending on your Layout, what will happen : shown als SlideShow, only one etc.)
This event is an exception for an recurring event.
Use this checkbox, if this is a frequently event.
location
If you want to start a marketingProcess (sending emails, reminder and so) after a registration, enter the ID of the configured salesforce marketing Process
name
If the user needs to confirm the registration, activate this option
Do you want to send an Email notification to the Organisers Email Adddress?
Do you want to send an Email notification to the Registrants Email Adddress?
organizer
registered Seats: Automatically computed after registration. if this value is higher than the sum of available and Waiting List Seats, registration is not possible
registrant

If you use the internal Registration modul, the registrated users are stored on the Page/Folder you specify here. It is a good idea to select a separate Sysfolder for each Event or each organizer to allow an Organizer easy access too only his registrations also in backend
An external Website, PDF, Form or somethings else is used for the Registration. Enter the URL or f.e. select the PDF from the Filelist
Registration is only visible for this usergroups / access rights
If you use any registration, you can enter the date, when you want to hide the Registration link
This ID is automatically generated by salesForce and only visible to help you to find the event in salesforce
salesForceRecordType This normaly should be empty. in special Cases this is usefull
This ID is automatically generated by salesForce and only visible to help you to find the event in salesforce
startDate
startTime
storeInCitrix
Store Events and registration In SalesForce CRM
subject of the Email to the Organizer. You can use PlaceHolders like ###EVENT_STARTDATE### ###EVENT_NAME### ###LOCATION_CITY### (see Docu)
subject of the Email to the Registrant. You can use PlaceHolders like ###EVENT_STARTDATE### ###EVENT_NAME### ###LOCATION_CITY### (see Docu)
tags
teaser
Upload one (small) Image. It is Depending on your Layout, what will happen : shown in List View or not)
testRegistrant
Introtext of the Email to the Organizer.
Text of the Email to the Registrant.
Introtext of the Email to the Registrant.
unconfirmed Seats: if you use the option: User must confirm, this is the amount of users, that did not click the link
If you activate this Option "Registration", the internal Modul for registration with many oprions is used
